ygData.subject: Re: Guild name and charter
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, Spirit of Harmony is of course still a possibility, but as I pointed out last night in the chat, the name implies such a goody-goody theme that evil
ygData.messageBody:
Well,

Spirit of Harmony is of course still a possibility, but as I pointed out
last night in the chat, the name implies such a "goody-goody" theme that
"evil" and maybe even "neutral" chacrhters would seem silly in the giuld.
therefore the poeple who remianed in the chat last night tried ot thik of
somehting that would not imply a good-oriented nature to the guild, but
rather a neutral orientation. Force of synergy can be taken in many
ways....synergy is the joining of energy or ideas, therefore the titlew
can be seen as the coming togethe of the ideas outlined in the charter, as
well as the energy of the poeple in the guild working towards the goals
outlined in the charter. In this sense even a dark elf neromancer, could
join our guild and seek the mutual respect or "tolerance"
of all members as well as the poeple of Norrath at large. this dosnt
mean this Dark elf necro has to necesarily like or love the wood elves
around, just respect and elarn from them as the charter describes.

I understand that these ideas may not work for everyone, but i think that
"spirit of harmony" would work even less for people.

In my personal case my 12th lvl Wizard (Fentus) is a neutral-good
charchter who would not want to join a guild that seeks Harmony between
all people (he just dose not see this as relaistic or practical) but a
guild that prmotes respect for poeple would be fine (especially since the
diversity he would then encouter could benefit him in his search for
knowledge)

Lastly, this guild name and charter would not necessarily be good for the
evilest of evil, though they would be wecome to join. but i dont think we
could createa guild that would be ok for EVERYONE. But spirit of Harmony
would be a step in the opposite direction.

-joe

On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, johnathan spectre wrote:

> From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
>
> > Guild name: Force of Synergy
>
> what happened to spirit of harmony?
>
